mapper.update: CREATE TABLE Products ( product_id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, product_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, price INT NOT NULL, category VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, quantity_available INT NOT NULL, last_update TIMESTAMP NOT NULL );

CREATE TABLE Orders ( order_id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, customer_name VARCHAR(30) NOT NULL, quantity_ordered INT NOT NULL, total_price INT NOT NULL, latitude DECIMAL(8, 5) NOT NULL, longitude DECIMAL(9, 5) NOT NULL, order_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL );

CREATE TABLE Deliveries ( delivery_id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, order_id INT NOT NULL, delivery_status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, latitude DECIMAL(8, 5) NOT NULL, longitude DECIMAL(9, 5) NOT NULL, delivery_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (order_id) REFERENCES Orders(order_id) );

CREATE TABLE Baskets ( basket_id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, product_id INT NOT NULL, delivery_id INT NOT NULL, temperature DECIMAL(5, 2) NOT NULL, humidity DECIMAL(5, 2) NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES Products(product_id), FOREIGN KEY (delivery_id) REFERENCES Deliveries(delivery_id) );

CREATE TABLE Recalls ( recall_id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, delivery_id INT NOT NULL, is_recalled BOOLEAN NOT NULL, recall_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, postponed_delivery_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (delivery_id) REFERENCES Deliveries(delivery_id) );

CREATE TABLE OrderDetails ( detail_id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, order_id INT NOT NULL, product_id INT NOT NULL, quantity INT NOT NULL, price INT NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (order_id) REFERENCES Orders(order_id), FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES Products(product_id) );
